title: Did the Nets Solve the Regular Season? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by The Ringer’s Rob Mahoney to discuss the Nets' experimental approach to the regular season (02:00), the success of buyout additions Blake Griffin and LaMarcus Aldridge (35:00), and more.
Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Rob Mahoney
